content: a pretty crochet flower square pattern featuring popcorn stitches for added texture this flower granny square is an easy pattern using basic stitches including single_crochet and double_crochet you will start with a round of half double crochets and then make some popcorn stitches for the 3-d flower center double_crochet cluster stitches form the next round and then you will square off your circle with some further rounds you can use any yarn and matching hook
